original_text: Thus saith the Lord of hosts; Let your hands be strong, ye that hear in these days these words by the mouth of the prophets, which were in the day that the foundation of the house of the Lord of hosts was laid, that the temple might be built.
korean_text: 만군의 여호와가 이같이 말하노라 만군의 여호와의 집 곧 성전을 건축하려고 그 지대를 쌓던 날에 있었던 선지자들의 입의 말을 이 날에 듣는 너희는 손을 견고히 할지어다

sentences.original_text: Thus saith the Lord of hosts
ye that hear in these days
these words by the mouth of the prophets
that the foundation of the house of the Lord of hosts was laid
sentences.korean_translation: 만군의 여호와의 집 기초가 세워진 날에

sentences.original_text: that the temple might be built
